snippet: The Trey McIntyre Project and members of the Korea National Contemporary Dance Company collaborate in a DanceMotion USA program at the Brooklyn Academy of Music.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews program of dance works, including premiere of piece The Unkindness of Ravens, choreographed and performed by Trey McIntyre Project and Korea National Contemporary Dance Company at Brooklyn Academy of Music.
lead_paragraph: The Trey McIntyre Project and members of the Korea National Contemporary Dance Company collaborate in a DanceMotion USA program at the Brooklyn Academy of Music.

headline.seo: Trey McIntyre Project and Korean Dancers at BAM
headline.main: Fanciful Theatricality Proves a Shared Language
headline.print_headline: Fanciful Theatricality Proves a Shared Language
